content: Westlake Chemical Corp has reached a deal to buy chemical producer Axiall Corp for $2.33 billion after a six-month pursuit that included multiple bids and a rival offer from South Korea's Lotte Chemical Corp.
name: Westlake Chemical Corporation
title: Westlake Chemical wins Axiall pursuit with raised $2.33 billion bid

content: * Axiall shares rise 26 pct   (Adds Lotte Chemical's withdrawal in paragraphs 4-6  updates share prices)
name: Westlake Chemical Corporation
title: UPDATE 3-Westlake Chemical wins Axiall pursuit with raised $2.33 bln bid

content: June 10 Axiall Corp has agreed to be acquired by Westlake Chemical Corp for $2.33 billion  days after South Korea's Lotte Chemical Corp offered to buy Axiall.
name: Westlake Chemical Corporation
title: Chemical maker Westlake agrees to buy Axiall for $2.33 bln

content: Feb 1 Axiall Corp shareholder Brigade Capital Management LP urged the chemicals company to consider selling itself and to restart discussions with Westlake Chemical Corp to negotiate a better offer.
name: Westlake Chemical Corporation
title: Shareholder asks Axiall to restart deal talks with Westlake Chemical

content: Axiall Corp   a U.S. chemical and building products maker  said on Friday it had rejected Westlake Chemical Corp's  $1.4 billion cash-and-stock offer  dismissing it as an attempt to scoop up its vinyls assets on the cheap.
name: Westlake Chemical Corporation
title: Axiall rejects $1.4 billion offer from Westlake Chemical
